Package app.connectors

Class ConnectorRegistreNode

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
app.connectors.ConnectorRegistreNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.RegistrationCI, Remote
public class ConnectorRegistreNode extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.RegistrationCI
A connector class that implements RegistrationCI to handle registration and management of sensor nodes in a sensor network. This connector provides methods to register nodes, check registration status, find neighboring nodes, and unregister nodes. This class extends AbstractConnector and delegates method calls to the registry component it is connected to, which performs the actual registration and management tasks.

    • registered

      public boolean registered(String nodeIdentifier) throws Exception
      Checks if a node is already registered in the network by its identifier.
      Specified by:
      registered in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.RegistrationCI
      Parameters:
      nodeIdentifier - The unique identifier of the node to check.
      Returns:
      true if the node is registered, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue accessing the registration status.

    • register

      public Set<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI> register(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI nodeInfo) throws Exception
      Registers a new node in the network and identifies its potential neighbors based on specific criteria.
      Specified by:
      register in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.RegistrationCI
      Parameters:
      nodeInfo - The information about the node to be registered.
      Returns:
      A set of NodeInfoI representing the neighbors of the newly registered node.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue registering the node.

    • findNewNeighbour

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI findNewNeighbour(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI nodeInfo, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.Direction d) throws Exception

      Specified by:
      findNewNeighbour in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.RegistrationCI
      Parameters:
      nodeInfo - The node information for which a new neighbor is being sought.
      d - The direction in which to look for a neighbor.
      Returns:
      NodeInfoI representing the new neighbor, or null if no neighbor is found.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue finding a new neighbor.
